segments.text: Does this hotel have a pool ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir , we don't have one . However , in our gym , we do have swim stations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Think of a deep bathtub that you can swim in , but against a current .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cool . What will they think of next ? How much are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , guests pay nothing to use the stations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent ! Now what are the hours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The gym is open 24/7 , but the stations are open from 7 a . m . to 10 p . m . only .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to change into my trunks right now !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you'll like the experience , sir . It's a great workout .
segments.speaker: S2
